title: Merck’s Earnings Are on Tuesday. Here’s What to Expect.
text:
Merck has trailed behind the market this year, but the stock has risen each time the giant pharmaceutical company has disclosed its earnings this year—a pattern investors are hoping will hold when its third-quarter results come out on Tuesday morning.

Merck (ticker: MRK) is up 7.7% year to date, while the S&P 500 has risen by 20.6%. Still, it is a better performance than the single-digit gains achieved by the Health Select Sector SPDR ETF (ticker: XLV) and the SPDR S&P Pharmaceuticals ETF (XPH).

...
description: Merck stock has risen each time the giant pharmaceutical company has disclosed its earnings this year—a pattern investors are hoping will hold when its third-quarter results come out.
